DOC.criteria: Undergoing IUI treatment : Unexplained infertility ( include endometriosis stage 12 ) Mild male factor ( > 5x106/ml motile sperm determine total sperm concentration x % A+B motility late spermogram ) Donor insemination Natural stimulate cycle clomiphene citrate letrozole At least 1 patent tube hysterosalpingogram , hysterosonogram laparoscopy within last two year Antral follicular count â‰¥10 FSH < 10 Polycystic ovarian syndrome cause oligo anovulation Patients take infertility medication ( metformin , 17B estradiol , progesterone gonadotropin ) Presence ovarian cyst follicle > 20 mm first ultrasound reason immediate HCG administration A previous sperm wash result le 5x106/ml motile sperm Previous inconclusive uLH test inability perform uLH test
